album.title: How to Dismantle an Atomic Bomb

wiki.content:
Vertigo is from the album 'How To Dismantle An Atomic Bomb', released in November 2004.  The song won U2 three Grammy Awards in 2005. It took the Grammy for 'Best Rock Performance By a Duo or Group With Vocal', 'Best Rock Song' and 'Best Short Form Music Video'.
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: Vertigo is from the album 'How To Dismantle An Atomic Bomb', released in November 2004.  The song won U2 three Grammy Awards in 2005. It took the Grammy for 'Best Rock Performance By a Duo or Group With Vocal', 'Best Rock Song' and 'Best Short Form Music Video'.

track.name: Vertigo
comments: Great production, but the lyrics make me laugh.
why does Bono go from 3 to fourteen in the begining?

"It's everything I wish I didn't know
Except you give me something
I can feel
Feel"
it's everything i wish i didn't know
...nice to hear The Edge do another style.....
